questions.question: The longest cricket match in history lasted 12 days.
The highest individual score in any form of cricket is over 500 runs.
The fastest century in any cricket match was scored in 35 balls.
The most runs scored in a single over in professional cricket is 77.
The largest cricket stadium in the world is located in India.
The oldest cricket ground still in use is Lord's Cricket Ground.
The highest altitude cricket match was played at over 2,000 meters above sea level.
The most sixes hit in a single innings in professional cricket is over 20.
The fastest bowling speed ever recorded in cricket exceeded 100 mph.
The longest six ever hit in cricket traveled over 150 meters.
